alert.note: Alert for Adams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 12:35AM EDT until May 20 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LEWIS AND SOUTHERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 1235 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Manchester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... West Union, Manchester, Rome, Concord, Bentonville, Trinity, Dunkinsville, Carrs, Cedar Mills and Herron Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
